{"id":551437260,"lang":"cpp","time":"7Â months","timestamp":1631097865,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"20 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/551437260/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        int n = word1.size(), m = word2.size();\n        vector<vector<int>> dp(n + 1, vector<int> (m + 1, 0));\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i <= n; i++)\n            dp[i][0] = i;\n        \n        for(int j = 0; j <= m; j++)\n            dp[0][j] = j;\n        \n        for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++)\n        {\n            for(int j = 1; j <= m; j++)\n            {\n                if(word1[i - 1] == word2[j - 1])\n                    dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j - 1];\n                else\n                {\n                    int a = dp[i - 1][j];\n                    int b = dp[i][j - 1];\n                    int c = dp[i - 1][j - 1];\n                    dp[i][j] = min({a, b, c}) + 1;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return dp[n][m];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance"}
